group_1.narration: [textBlack:To Hanna]
[textBlack:Where should we start patrolling]@[textBlack:tomorrow?]@[textBlack:Near the apartment complex again?]
[textBlack:She said "that takes care of it" and all,]@[textBlack:but I'm not so sure myself.]
[textBlack:Maybe we should go look further out?]@[textBlack:That'd be nice too!]
[textBlack:To Sena]
[textBlack:Witch talk is good and all,]@[textBlack:but lately it's the only thing you]@[textBlack:write about.]
[textBlack:Are you going to school?]@[textBlack:And going home on time?]
[textBlack:Don't push yourself too hard.]@[textBlack:It was better when you were doing]@[textBlack:things at your own pace...]
[textBlack:How can you say that, Hanna?]
[textBlack:Everyone will suffer if we]@[textBlack:cut corners, right?]
[textBlack:Nothing's more important to me than]@[textBlack:fighting Witches and protecting the]@[textBlack:peace for everyone.]@[textBlack:...It makes me feel so fulfilled.]
[textBlack:Right now, I'm really happy.]@[textBlack:I won't stop for anything.]
When we started using the exchange diary,@Hanna was the one who didn't care@to talk about anything but Witches.@But now, the roles had reversed.
Hanna couldn't make heads or tails about it.
But I couldn't tell her what was really going on...@I couldn't bring myself to reveal how awful I was.
[textBlack:Hey, Sena...]@[textBlack:There's something I haven't been]@[textBlack:telling you.]
[textBlack:What is it? You sound so serious...]@[textBlack:If you say it like that,]@[textBlack:it'll make me nervous, you know?]
[textBlack:I used...]@[textBlack:to get bullied at school.]
[textBlack:And both of my parents were garbage]@[textBlack:to boot, and in the end they went]@[textBlack:and kicked the bucket.]@[textBlack:I got sent to an orphanage...]
What Hanna had written was the candid truth@of her life until now.
It was far worse than anything I had experienced.@Just reading it was painful.
[textBlack:Not a single good thing]@[textBlack:happened to me.]@[textBlack:I had nobody I could trust,]@[textBlack:everybody was against me.]
[textBlack:My entire life was]@[textBlack:pitch-black darkness.]
[textBlack:But then I met you...]
[textBlack:Together we talked until we]@[textBlack:lost track of time]@[textBlack:and went to all sorts of places.]
[textBlack:All those times, how do I put it...]
[textBlack:It's like they're sparkling within me.]
[textBlack:And they feel all the brighter]@[textBlack:because I thought I'd be trapped]@[textBlack:in darkness forever...]
[textBlack:Even someone like me]@[textBlack:can have such light.]
[textBlack:...That's what you taught me.]
[textBlack:So if there's anything worrying you,]@[textBlack:if you feel like you can't go on]@[textBlack:anymore...]
[textBlack:Let me help you.]
[textBlack:You can tell me anything.]
"I'll tell her everything."

group_1.textRight: I do know that, don't I?@After all the time we spent together?
It's Hanna we're talking about.@Even if she knows I've been lying to her,
Even if I become useless,@she won't leave me.
I know that much, right?@We've always been together, after all.

group_1.textLeft: I knew, but I was still scared.
I felt that if I put my faith in anything,@I'd get betrayed.

group_1.textRight: It's alright.@Hanna would never betray me.

group_1.narration: I wrote down every single thing@I had been hiding.
About school, about home,@about the fake family I'd introduced to her,@everything.
And I apologized for all of it.
[textBlack:At the end of the day, I have nothing.]
[textBlack:That's why I tried to fill the gap with lies.]
[textBlack:I'm hollow.]
[textBlack:You said that the days we spent together]@[textBlack:sparkled within you,]
[textBlack:but those were days you spent]@[textBlack:with a fake me...]
[textBlack:But if you could forgive the me right here]@[textBlack:and stay by my side,]
[textBlack:then maybe, even if I'm hollow,]@[textBlack:I too could have some of that light...?]
[textBlack:Even if I don't know who I am anymore,]@[textBlack:I would be able to think that I belong here...]
[textBlack:If I can be with you,]@[textBlack:I think I could grasp such a beautiful sparkle.]
[textBlack:That would be wonderful...]
I took everything I had written@and tore it up along with my true feelings.
Then, I wrote down lies.
[textBlack: I see...]@[textBlack:You've been through a lot, Hanna.]
[textBlack:But don't worry.]@[textBlack:From now on, I'll protect you.]
[textBlack:Thank you for telling me.]
[textBlack:That's not the point...]
[textBlack:Let me put it bluntly.]@[textBlack:I don't give a crap about Witches.]
[textBlack:The only thing I want to know]@[textBlack:is if you're okay!]
[textBlack:If you're feeling trapped]@[textBlack:by all sorts of stuff]
[textBlack:to the point where you've given up]@[textBlack:on yourself,]
[textBlack:then maybe...]@[textBlack:you should just run away with me...]
[textBlack:Actually, it might be pretty nice]@[textBlack:to go all out and have fun]@[textBlack:somewhere far away...]
[textBlack:I won't do that.]@[textBlack:I'm not going anywhere.]
[textBlack:There are things I want to protect here...]@[textBlack:Because there's nowhere else where]@[textBlack:I can be happy like this.]
[textBlack:That's why I will fight@as a Magical Girl here.]
[textBlack:...Really?]
[textBlack:Yes.]
[textBlack:I'm just fine.]
If I told her everything here...@I'd be crying on the shoulder of somebody@who I know will forgive me.
That's just being spoiled.
I have to face things myself.
I have to take action and change the situation,@not just fearfully hide in my shell.
I can't just run away from everything around me.
That's what I have to do first.
Once I've accomplished it,@that's when I'll face Hanna.
...That's what I thought back then.
But it was already too late.
The time of my punishment@was right before my eyes.
